channel.title: mvn on 打工笔记
channel.description: Recent content in mvn on 打工笔记

item.title: mvn-generate-project
item.description: use mvn cli to generate a project: mvn archetype:generate -DgroupId=tk.amrom -DartifactId=proto-java -DinteractiveMode=false -DoutputDirectory=./ explain: use plugin archetype:generate require args groutId and artifactId and DinteractiveMode
